EmailTemplate.name: Connect - Email e-Zine EMEA.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: NEW: “Connect” Banking Magazine is Here! Read Issue #1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re certain the last 12 months have been unusual at {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}}.
You’re not alone – almost every financial institution on the planet has had to adapt or accelerate innovation to be able to keep serving customers.
But what’s next?
Get answers and industry insights in our new quarterly banking magazine, CONNECT. Read the first issue here. <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/connect-magazine]]> You’ll find analysis and expert insight on what’s coming next, plus a view on the latest industry innovations, thought leadership and best practices.
From how to manage cash in a digital world to Amazon Go for banking to a “1 in a million” story—it’s all in CONNECT. ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
